gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.service
Class ReportSubmissionService

java.lang.Object
  gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.service.ReportSubmissionService

@Transactional
public class ReportSubmissionService
extends java.lang.Object

This class is responsible for submission of an ExpeditedAdverseEventReport

Author:
Biju Joseph, Srini Akkala

This method will generate the PDF and xml content.

Parameters:

doPreSubmitReport

public void doPreSubmitReport(ReportSubmissionService.ReportSubmissionContext context)
This method will do the pre submission initializations. - Will generate the report deliveries - Will start the report tracking. - Will generate the PDF and XMLs of the report. - Will attach report content to report version. - Will associate AEs to report version.

Parameters:
context -

doPostSubmitReport

public void doPostSubmitReport(ReportSubmissionService.ReportSubmissionContext context)
This method will do the post submission activities. This method also could be invoked from ESB response processing (if submission was successful).

Parameters:
context -

submitReport

public void submitReport(Report report)
Will do the following. 1. Do the pre submission initializations 2a. Notify the report to external system 2b. Notify email recipients 3. Do post submit activities.
